summary: Yugoslavia was a country in Europe that existed from 1918 to 1992. It was formed after World War I by merging the Kingdom of Serbia with other South Slavic regions. The country's name was changed to the Kingdom of Yugoslavia in 1929. During World War II, it was occupied by Axis powers but later became a communist-led republic. It was renamed the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (SFRY) in 1963 and consisted of six republics. After political and ethnic conflicts, Yugoslavia broke up into several countries, leading to the Yugoslav Wars.
title: Yugoslavia
